*Ca (Z = 20) Atomic weight: /A_r / = 40.08000 g mol^-1 *   Nominal
density:   /ρ/ (g cm^-3 ) = 1.5500
    /σ//_a /(barns/atom) = [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 )  ×  6.65545E+01 
    /E/(eV) [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 ) = /f/_2 (/e/ atom^-1 )  ×  1.04991E+06 
    7 edges. Edge energies (keV):

      M I    4.37000E-02  M II   2.54000E-02  M III  2.54000E-02

    Nuclear Thomson correction /f/_NT = -5.4748E-03 /e/ atom^-1
